column4: I am in need of some assistance with Ubuntu Netbook Remix. I have it running on a USB flash drive just as the guides say. Can I download and install programs on to this, or is it merely a live session that would still need installed?
It's a live session that still needs installing.
Is it possible to install and boot off of a USB flash drive?
Maybe, if you put another flash drive in there and point the installer at it. I haven't tried it, though.
